segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen, near the open cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a young boy, quite daringly, climbing on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried it might tip over backward at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching himself, trying to reach something inside the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, I see it now—it's a large jar labeled "COOKIE JAR" filled to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With one hand, he’s already reaching in, probably grabbing as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand is holding a plate, either as a makeshift lid or to catch the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic bit of childhood mischief, isn't it, a secret cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, even if his method is dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He doesn't seem to have a care in the world about falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me nervous just watching him, suspended there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That fall would certainly make a mess, and probably hurt quite a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR
